QuestData.Title: The Crumbling Hall
QuestData.Description: An ancient mogu artifact has been uncovered in the Guo-Lai Vault, beyond the Hall of Statues. We've made repeated attempts to retrieve it, but none have been successful.$B$BWe cannot let this artifact fall into the hands of the Shao-Tien. I need someone capable to retrieve it, and quickly.$B$BAre you in?
